title: Look Back at 504 - Phil Fushigi Riventeen
description:
First I’ll ramble about Riven and then I’ll try and remember the story of the greatest Fushigi artist of all time. Inspired by the great McElory brothers over at “My Brother, My Brother and Me”. http://www.maximumfun.org/shows/my-brother-my-brother-and-me

Check out Sleep Whispers Podcast it is 100% gentle whispering. You will hear bedtime stories, poems, guided relaxations, Wikipedia pages about different topics, trivia questions, and listener feedback – all done in a light and relaxing whisper. So if you ever struggle to fall asleep, then just search for the Sleep Whispers podcast in your podcast player, or go to https://sleepwhispers.com/t-shirts-and-more/ and see Scooter wearing his Sleep Whispers shirt!

Allform - Helix Sleep has LEFT the bedroom and started making sofas, it’s the easiest way you can customize a sofa using premium materials, and at a fraction of the cost of traditional stores. They just launched a new company called Allform and they are already making the best sofas we’ve ever seen. Allform is offering 20% off all orders for our listeners at allform.com/sleep.

Helix Sleep- Just go to helixsleep.com/sleep, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life.

Betterhelp- Betterhelp offers licensed professional counselors, it’s a truly affordable option and our listeners get 10% off your first month with discount code “sleepwithme”. Go over to www.betterhelp.com/sleepwithme and simply fill out a questionnaire to help them assess your needs and get matched with a counselor you’ll love.

Amazon Pharmacy - saves you time, easily works with your doctor, and delivers medication right to your door. Amazon Prime members get FREE 2-Day Delivery and save on prescription medication when paying without insurance. Learn more at amazon.com/sleeprx.

Betterhelp- Betterhelp offers licensed professional counselors, it’s a truly affordable option and our listeners get 10% off your first month with discount code “sleepwithme”. Go over to www.betterhelp.com/sleepwithme and simply fill out a questionnaire to help them assess your needs and get matched with a counselor you’ll love.

Amazon Pharmacy - saves you time, easily works with your doctor, and delivers medication right to your door. Amazon Prime members get FREE 2-Day Delivery and save on prescription medication when paying without insurance. Learn more at amazon.com/sleeprx.

Daily Harvest- delivers delicious, clean food right to your door. It takes just a few minutes to prepare and I never have to question if the food I’m eating is good for me. Use SLEEPWITHME for $25 off your FIRST box at dailyharvest.com.

LinkedIn - When your business is ready to make that next hire, find the right person with LinkedIn Jobs. And now, you can post a job for free. Just visit LinkedIn.com/SLEEP. Terms and conditions apply.

Grove Collaborative- an online marketplace that delivers all-natural home, beauty, and personal care products directly to your door! Go to Grove.co/sleep for FREE gift with your first order of $30 or more.
